# deps/skia/src/pipe

set(SKIA_PIPE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/pipe")
set(SKIA_PIPE_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/pipe")

file(GLOB SKIA_PIPE_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_PIPE_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_PIPE_SOURCES "${SKIA_PIPE_DIR}/*.cpp")
file(GLOB SKIA_PIPE_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_PIPE_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_PIPE_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_PIPE_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_PIPE_SOURCES})

set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
